Added_Other.name: FFlagAccountLockConsoleLogout_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Automatically logs out users from consoles when their accounts are locked.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by preventing unauthorized access on consoles.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAccountLockModal_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Displays a modal for account locking when suspicious activity is detected.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps players secure their accounts by alerting them to potential threats.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableBiometricChallenges_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces biometric authentication for account security.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides an extra layer of security for player accounts.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableChallengeRateLimit_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Imposes a limit on how often players can attempt challenges.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents players from spamming challenges, ensuring a fairer gameplay experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableNativeChallengeAbandonment_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows players to exit challenges without penalties in a more integrated way.
Added_Other.purpose: Gives players the freedom to leave challenges without feeling stuck or punished.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPersonaLivenessFocusNavigation_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Enhances navigation focus for user profiles in the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to navigate and interact with their profiles and friends.
